title: Top Places to visit in Rayachoti, Andhra Pradesh
content: Rayachoty or "Rachaveedu" or "Rayachoti" or "Rajaveedu" is a town in Kadapa district of the Indian state of Andhra Pradesh. It is a municipality in Rayachoty Mandal of the Kadapa revenue division. It is one of the oldest towns in Andhra Pradesh. Rayachoty is famous for thousand years old The Lord
